statements: UPDATE travel_data SET trip_cost = 1500.50 WHERE trip_id = 'fc97f889-4fcc-4ae1-bf1e-aa8622af2eb1';

UPDATE travel_data SET trip_cost = 1500.75, destination = 'Paris' WHERE trip_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE travel_data SET trip_cost = 2000.00, trip_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE customer_id = '98765432-1010-3030-4040-1234567890ab';
UPDATE travel_records SET distance_traveled = 300.50 WHERE travel_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_info SET policy_type = 'Platinum', age = 35 WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE travel_records SET destination = 'Paris', distance_traveled = 1500.45 WHERE travel_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_info SET age = 35, policy_type = 'Platinum' WHERE customer_id = 5;
UPDATE Travelers SET traveler_name='Alice', traveler_age=30 WHERE traveler_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Trips SET trip_duration=7, trip_cost=500.00 WHERE trip_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Travelers SET traveler_age = 30, traveler_country = 'USA' WHERE traveler_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Trips SET trip_cost = 1500.00, trip_duration = 7 WHERE trip_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Travel_Insurance_Customers SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_age=35 WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Travel_Destinations SET destination_rating=4, destination_description='Beautiful island with stunning beaches' WHERE destination_id=2;
UPDATE Travel_Insurance_Customers SET customer_age = 35, customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE Travel_Insurance_Policies SET policy_coverage = 'Full Coverage', policy_price = 500.00, policy_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE policy_id = 456
UPDATE travel_records SET travel_distance=150.5 WHERE record_id=101;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_message='Great service!' WHERE feedback_id=201;
UPDATE travel_records SET source_location = 'New York', travel_distance = 250.75 WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE popular_destinations SET rating = 4.5, num_visits = num_visits + 1 WHERE destination_id = 201;
